title: FTX Could Have Lost Over $1B Due to Lax Security Practices: Report
description: Attackers were able to steal nearly $400 million worth of various tokens after FTX was hacked in November 2022. But it could have been worse.

title: Microsoft’s Dual Focus: AI Chip Innovation and Expanding Gaming Presence with Activision Blizzard Acquisition

title: Google’s Asia-Pacific Women Founders Fund Backs AI Startups
description: Google’s commitment to fostering innovation in the Asia-Pacific region is taking a significant step forward with its Women Founders Fund. This initiative, managed by Google for Startups, is designed to support female founders and their groundbreaking startups. The fund, launched in August, focuses on the burgeoning field of artificial intelligence (AI) and offers selected startups ... Read more

title: 3 Things Every Bull Run Has in Common
description:
Crypto investors are getting weary. It’s been close to 3 years since the last bull run. Yet, there’s no sign of the next one beginning soon. Or is there? Today, we’ll explore 3 things that every bull run has in common. For this, you’ll need to pay close attention! So, when these signs arrive, you’ll […]

title: Inside the Courtroom: Reporter Gives First-Hand Account of SBF Trial
description:
In a recent episode of the Thinking Crypto Podcast, host Tony Edward interviewed renowned crypto influencer Tiffany Fong, who shared her experience in the fraud trial of FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried. Given her presence in the court, Fong narrated the incident, providing exclusive insights into the SBF’s first week on trial. Fong first highlighted the […]
